title: Add static asset for seeded red floral men’s shirt

requirements.summary: Add the required static generated clothing image asset so the seeded red floral shirt photo path resolves correctly in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/men_shirt_red_floral.dim_480x640.jpeg`.
The new seeded item’s `photo` field is exactly `/assets/generated/men_shirt_red_floral.dim_480x640.jpeg`.

Loading the app and running a search for itemType=Shirt, color=Red, pattern=Floral shows the new item in results without a broken image (image loads successfully, or the existing fallback behavior is used if it fails).

file_operations.description: Add the static clothing photo asset file for the newly seeded red floral men’s shirt. This filename and extension must exactly match `/assets/generated/men_shirt_red_floral.dim_480x640.jpeg` so existing UI components (e.g., ItemCard/ItemDetailDialog using normalizePhotoPath) can render it without a broken image.
